oaidtb.boosters
Class AdaBoostMH

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--weka.classifiers.Classifier
        |
        +--weka.classifiers.DistributionClassifier
              |
              +--oaidtb.boosters.AdaBoostMH
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, IterativeUpdatableClassifier, weka.core.OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable, weka.core.WeightedInstancesHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSAdaBoostMH
public class AdaBoostMH
extends weka.classifiers.DistributionClassifier
implements weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.WeightedInstancesHandler, IterativeUpdatableClassifier

Class for boosting using Schapire & Singer's AdaBoostMH. For more information see:

Schapire R.E. & & Singer Y.: Improved boosting algorithms using confidence rated-predictions. Machine Learning, 37(3):297-336, 1999

This implementation follows the guidelines given in:

Jerome Friedman, Trevor Hastie and Robert Tibshirani: Additive logistic regression: a statistical view of boosting. The Annals of Statistics, 38(2): 337-374, April 2000.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Santiago David Villalba Bartolomé
See Also:

                                  int classifierIndex)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Get the classifier's vote for the instance; the (vectorial) sum of all base classifiers vote vectors must be the final combined hypothesis of the booster.
Specified by:

Parameters:

classifierIndex - The base classifier index
Returns:
The vote of the base classifier to the overall classifier

java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

                        throws java.lang.Exception

Overrides:

instance - the instance to be classified
Returns:
the predicted most likely class for the instance or Instance.missingValue() if no prediction is made

java.lang.Exception - if an error occurred during the prediction

relabel

purgeTrainData

public void purgeTrainData()
Free the memory reserved to the train dataset. WARNING: After a call to this function the booster will not be ready to perform more iterations.

purgeIterations

public void purgeIterations(int numIterations)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Eliminate the last numIterations performed from the final combined hypothesis. Note: To free the memory allocated, this method must be overriden
Parameters:
numIterations - The number of iterations to get rid of
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If numIterations parameter is incorrect

getClassifier

public weka.classifiers.DistributionClassifier getClassifier(int itIndex)
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a DistributionClassifier that represents the classifier at iteration itIndex

The distribution classifier obtained is equivalent to secNormalize(getClassifierVote(instance, itIndex)

TODO: Control the persistence of the classifier returned even after the enclosing MH class have been reset or dropped (maintain the references).

java.lang.Exception - if an error happens
